A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Half of the movie ended up being irrelevant and was just a time filler. They could have combined the force awakens and the last jedi and we could have seen all of the original cast and the new characters would have had more depth added to them. Instead\, Mark Hamill got killed off in the lamest way possible (invulnerable hologram that disappeared) and the one person who should have had a farewell end (Carie Fisher) turned into Superman. In all the movie had lazy writing and tons of plot holes. It seems like all they cared about is making money off the audiance incstead of delivering a quality product.
